mapper.select: SELECT t1.TIME_LIMIT FROM ( SELECT flod.TIME_LIMIT, flod.APP_ID FROM ACT_TPL_APP_FLOWDEF flod INNER JOIN act_tpl_app_trigger trg ON flod.APP_FLOWDEF_ID = trg.TRIGGER_APP_FLOWDEF_ID INNER JOIN aea_item_ver iv ON iv.ITEM_VER_ID = trg.BUS_RECORD_ID WHERE trg.IS_DELETED = '0' AND iv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId} ) t1 INNER JOIN aea_par_stage stage ON t1.APP_ID = stage.APP_ID WHERE stage.STAGE_ID = #{stageId} LIMIT 1

SELECT apsi.ITEM_ID itemId, apsi.STAGE_ID stageId, aib.IS_CATALOG isCatalog, apsi.IS_OPTION_ITEM isOptionItem, aib.DUE_NUM dueNum FROM aea_par_stage_item apsi INNER JOIN aea_item_basic aib ON apsi.ITEM_VER_ID = aib.ITEM_VER_ID WHERE STAGE_ITEM_ID = #{stageItemId}

FROM aea_item_basic pib INNER JOIN ( SELECT ib.item_ver_id, i.PARENT_ITEM_ID FROM aea_item_basic ib INNER JOIN aea_item i ON ib.item_id = i.item_id WHERE ib.item_ver_id = #{itemVerId} ) cib ON cib.PARENT_ITEM_ID = pib.item_id INNER JOIN AEA_ITEM_VER aiv ON aiv.item_ver_id = pib.item_ver_id WHERE aiv.ITEM_VER_STATUS IN ('1', '2') LIMIT 1
SELECT apsi.item_id,stage.STAGE_ID FROM AEA_PAR_STAGE_ITEM apsi INNER JOIN AEA_PAR_STAGE stage ON stage.STAGE_ID = apsi.STAGE_ID GROUP BY apsi.item_id,stage.STAGE_ID

SELECT iteminst.iteminst_id AS dfsjzj,aib_123.ITEM_CODE AS spsxbm FROM AEA_HI_ITEMINST iteminst INNER JOIN AEA_HI_SERIESINST ahs ON ahs.SERIESINST_ID = iteminst.SERIESINST_ID INNER JOIN AEA_ITEM_BASIC aib_123 ON aib_123.ITEM_VER_ID = iteminst.ITEM_VER_ID INNER JOIN AEA_APPLYINST_PROJ aap ON aap.APPLYINST_ID = ahs.APPLYINST_ID INNER JOIN AEA_PROJ_INFO proj ON proj.PROJ_INFO_ID = aap.PROJ_INFO_ID WHERE replace(proj.GCBM, '#', '-') = #{gcdm}
